short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blip is a browser extension that allows you to create and share video clips from YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate articles, transcripts and gists from YouTube videos, all for free. Blip appears as a small pane right on the YouTube website.
